Open. May close temporarily for severe weather. Information: 970-586-1222.

No vehicles over 35 feet in length, commercial or private, due to tight switchbacks. Independence Pass will close to through traffic for the USAPC bike race at 10:30 am to approximately 6 pm August 22nd and at 8am westbound and 9 am eastbound until approximately 2:30 pm on August 23rd. Overnight camping between mile post 56 and 66 is prohibited. Parking and viewing areas on the pass are limited.

No vehicles over 35 ft length allowed over Independence Pass, including buses, semis, RVs, stock trailers, etc. Independence Pass will close to through traffic for the USAPC bike race at 10:30 am to approximately 6 pm August 22nd and at 8am westbound and 9 am eastbound until approximately 2:30 pm on August 23rd. Overnight camping between mile post 56 and 66 is prohibited. Parking and viewing areas on the pass are limited.

rc:WeatherRoute.rc:Comment: Open. May close temporaily for severe weather. Road maintained by Chaffee County. Call (719) 539-6961 for info. Cottonwood pass will close from the Denny Creek Trailhead to Taylor Reservoir at 3 pm 8/21 to approximately 1 pm 8/22 for the USAPC bike race, pedestrians and bicycles can access the road, but vehicles will not be allowed.
